analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ nakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato kāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ kāmāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca

original: Nakusalaṁ nanakāmāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na na kāmāvacaram dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na kāmāvacaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
